name: Oh Tanajura!
description:
One thing is a fact: ants are awesome with construction. Become a Tanajura and take control of your new anthill and make it grow bigger and bigger!

Control 3 types of ants: the Builders (who create new chambers), the Cutters (who collect leaves), and the Dumpers (who clean up the anthill).

Use the WASD keys to move the camera;

Use E to zoom in;

Use Q to zoom out;

Use 'Mouse Click' to give commands to the ants.
